about_the_game:
Hi-Resolution Opening/Ending Theme EP for Momoiro Closet.
Includes 2 tracks in both FLAC and WAV format.

1. Voila! Magic Closet
Vocals: Haruko Momoi
Lyrics&Music: Haruko Momoi
Arrangement: Haraddy

2. To The Next Level
Vocals: Chiaki Hashimoto
Lyrics: Yoshikazu Kuwashima
Composition & Arrangement: Yuuki Xano from STRIKERS


Note:
-You need a device which supports hi-resolution audio in order to properly play back these audio files.

FLAC:96kHz 24bit
WAV:96kHz 24bit
